Package org.apache.commons.lang3.mutable

Class MutableShort

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Number
      • org.apache.commons.lang3.mutable.MutableShort
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<MutableShort>, Mutable<java.lang.Number>
    public class MutableShort
extends java.lang.Number
implements java.lang.Comparable<MutableShort>, Mutable<java.lang.Number>
    A mutable short wrapper.

    Note that as MutableShort does not extend Short, it is not treated by String.format as a Short parameter.

    Since:
    2.1
    See Also:
    Short, Serialized Form

      • getAndIncrement

        public short getAndIncrement()
        Increments this instance's value by 1; this method returns the value associated with the instance immediately prior to the increment operation. This method is not thread safe.
        Returns:

        public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
